message: No logging out. When you fist install, you set up all your iCloud stuff with your apple ID. The apple ID tied to the device is what's connected to iMessages.

Does anyone have any insight on how the new iMessage device is handled on a shared device.  I know that you can continue a conversation from an iPhone on the iPad but is there a way to "log in" and "log out"?  For instance both my wife and I have iPhones but there is a shared iPad.  Can anyone with a iOS5 preview share any details?
just had the misfortune of my partner seeing messages he shoudnt be seeing on his ipad. damn imessage!
